title: Finally At Home In New York, JiHAE Releases 'Illusion of You'
teaser: As the daughter of a diplomat, the singer-songwriter JiHAE lived in cities across the world. She tells NPR's Rachel Martin about her new album, and the tension she feels with her new home, New York.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
